name: Medical Application
desc: Development of a medical solution dedicated to managing appointments and automating prescriptions.

name: Monitoring System
desc: Implementation of a real-time facial detection and recognition system. The architecture is based on a star model.

name: Stock Market Simulation
desc: Development of a stock trading simulator replicating real-time stock market mechanisms.

name: Drive Platform
desc: Development of an online file storage service that efficiently manages file storage and lifecycle.

name: GeoTracking Platform
desc: Creation of a real-time geolocation platform with geotracking and geofencing, based on a microservices and DDD architecture.

name: Agency Directory
desc: Design, development, and deployment of a solution for referencing, characterizing, and continuously monitoring CAFPI's French agencies.
